title: Practical Placeholders
text: loripsum() function probably best go-place holder text API package, provides control output far contents concerned. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Efficiens dici potest. Nihil enim hoc differt. Contemnit enim disserendi elegantiam, confuse loquitur. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. hoc usque quaque, aliter vita? Etiam beatissimum? Piso igitur hoc modo, vir optimus tuique, ut scis, amantissimus. Tenent mordicus. schola desinis. Bork Nummus Croesi divitiis obscuratur, pars est tamen divitiarum. Si quae forte-possumus. Hoc est vim afferre, Torquate, sensibus, extorquere ex animis cognitiones verborum, quibus inbuti sumus. De bona autem fama-quam enim appellant eÈdoj¤, aptius est bonam famam hoc loco appellare quam gloriam-Chrysippus quidem et Diogenes detracta utilitate ne digitum quidem eius causa porrigendum esse dicebant; Sed quanta sit alias, nunc tantum possitne esse tanta. Quippe: habes enim rhetoribus; Nam si quae sunt aliae, falsum est omnis animi voluptates esse e corporis societate. Quae cum dixisset paulumque institisset, Quid est? Sumenda potius quam expetenda. Quamquam tu hanc copiosiorem etiam soles dicere. Sed tamen intellego quid velit. Beatus sibi videtur esse moriens. Dempta enim aeternitate nihilo beatior Iuppiter quam Epicurus; Itaque hoc frequenter dici solet vobis, non intellegere nos, quam dicat Epicurus voluptatem. Sin te auctoritas commovebat, nobisne omnibus et Platoni ipsi nescio quem illum anteponebas? Quae controversiam veniunt, de iis, si placet, disseramus. Bork Bork Hunc vos beatum; Quid istud rogas? Bork Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias;
code: example_loripsum <-   loripsum(     n = 3L,     length = "short",     decorate = TRUE, # adds italics, bold, etc.     link = TRUE, # adds some links     ul = TRUE, # adds an unordered list (bullets)     ol = TRUE, # adds an ordererd list (numbers)     dl = TRUE, # adds a description list (headers and contents)     bq = TRUE, # adds a blockquote     code = TRUE, # adds code samples     headers = FALSE, # adds headers - may mess with RMarkdown/Quarto!     allcaps = FALSE, # capitalises the whole output     prude = TRUE # see above note   ) Crasso, quem semel ait in vita risisse Lucilius, non contigit, ut ea re minus agelastoj ut ait idem, vocaretur.  Iam doloris medicamenta illa Epicurea tamquam de narthecio proment: Si gravis, brevis;

Editors’ Picks Yes, Fake News Problem. ’s Real News Problem, . next, possibly final step, state Court Appeals Albany, received arguments sides expected rule soon whether Zlotnick’s appeal can proceed. Four four followed including harassing Sebastian Vettel error Canada, tyre management masterclass Monaco clinical, precision dissection France finished 18 seconds ahead.

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: litipsum() function really “silly” whimsical ipsum generators; grabs excerpts public domain classic literature like Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, . Users can opt paragraph list tags, don’t expect complicated elements . long searchlight discovered distance away schooner sails set, apparently vessel noticed earlier evening. wind time backed east, shudder amongst watchers cliff realized terrible danger now . port lay great flat reef many good ships time time suffered, , wind blowing present quarter, quite impossible fetch entrance harbour. now nearly hour high tide, waves great troughs shallows shore almost visible, schooner, sails set, rushing speed , words one old salt, “must fetch somewhere, hell.” came another rush sea-fog, greater hitherto–mass dank mist, seemed close things like grey pall, left available men organ hearing, roar tempest, crash thunder, booming mighty billows came damp oblivion even louder . rays searchlight kept fixed harbour mouth across East Pier, shock expected, men waited breathless. wind suddenly shifted north-east, remnant sea-fog melted blast; , mirabile dictu, piers, leaping wave wave rushed headlong speed, swept strange schooner blast, sail set, gained safety harbour. searchlight followed , shudder ran saw , lashed helm corpse, drooping head, swung horribly fro motion ship. form seen deck . great awe came realised ship, miracle, found harbour, unsteered save hand dead man! However, took place quickly takes write words. schooner paused , rushing across harbour, pitched accumulation sand gravel washed many tides many storms south-east corner pier jutting East Cliff, known locally Tate Hill Pier. course considerable concussion vessel drove sand heap. Every spar, rope, stay strained, “top-hammer” came crashing . , strangest , instant shore touched, immense dog sprang deck , shot concussion, running forward, jumped bow sand. Making straight steep cliff, churchyard hangs laneway East Pier steeply flat tombstones–“thruff-steans” “-stones,” call Whitby vernacular–actually project sustaining cliff fallen away, disappeared darkness, seemed intensified just beyond focus searchlight. happened one moment Tate Hill Pier, whose houses close proximity either bed heights . Thus coastguard duty eastern side harbour, ran little pier, first climb board. men working searchlight, scouring entrance harbour without seeing anything, turned light derelict kept . coastguard ran aft, came beside wheel, bent examine , recoiled though sudden emotion. seemed pique general curiosity, quite number people began run. good way round West Cliff Drawbridge Tate Hill Pier, correspondent fairly good runner, came well ahead crowd. arrived, however, found already assembled pier crowd, coastguard police refused allow come board. courtesy chief boatman, , correspondent, permitted climb deck, one small group saw dead seaman whilst actually lashed wheel.
code: example_lit <-   litipsum(n = 3L,            tag = "p", # add p tags            source = "dracula") # take from dracula

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: devlorem() gives little control output. However, output pretty fun - gives paragraphs impersonating famous actor pop culture icon. Michael Caine Well, thought good sport. men aren’t looking anything logical, like money. can’t bought, bullied, reasoned, negotiated . men just want watch world burn. Every great magic trick consists three parts acts. first part called “Pledge.” magician shows something ordinary: deck cards, bird man. shows object. Perhaps asks inspect see indeed real, unaltered, normal. course… probably isn’t. second act called “Turn.” magician takes ordinary something makes something extraordinary. Now ’re looking secret… won’t find , course ’re really looking. don’t really want know. want fooled. wouldn’t clap yet. making something disappear isn’t enough; bring back. ’s every magic trick third act, hardest part, part call “Prestige.” don’t reckon ’ve got long. Seen . Gut wound. slug’s probably torn right liver. Mate mine Ulster got caught sniper fire. Bullet blew inside . screamed good 10 minutes. couldn’t send medic , section hot. took cover… watched die. ’ve never told … anyone… ’ve called ambulance… girl. see one end journey. Leaving make understand. ’re Batman anymore. find another way. used talk finishing, life beyond awful cave. respect, Master Wayne, perhaps man don’t fully understand, either. long time ago, Burma. friends working local government. trying buy loyalty tribal leaders bribing precious stones. caravans raided forest north Rangoon bandit. went looking stones. six months, never met anyone traded . One day, saw child playing ruby size tangerine. bandit throwing away.
code: example_dev <- devlorem(n = 5L)

Harpymimus Sauropelta Brachytaenius Wamweracaudia Pareiasaurus Arizonasaurus Colepiocephale Magnirostris Chassternbergia Incisivosaurus Jinzhousaurus Abydosaurus Incisivosaurus Euronychodon Theiophytalia.

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: baconipsum() hipsteripsum() similar options identical simply (partly) replace random Latin lorem ipsum meat words hipster-y phrases, respectively. MEAT: Bacon ipsum dolor amet sausage beef ribs ground round ribeye, short loin prosciutto cow pork belly turducken pork chop meatball kevin drumstick. Cupim kevin landjaeger fatback. Doner pig tenderloin salami burgdoggen shankle. Hamburger rump swine, picanha chuck prosciutto salami ham hock ham cupim shankle. Frankfurter beef spare ribs pig, bacon meatball pork belly. HIPSTER: ’m baby enamel pin woke seitan viral heirloom. Venmo trust fund retro, tote bag hashtag DIY tilde activated charcoal JOMO street art. Squid meggings man braid skateboard. Sartorial everyday carry freegan normcore raclette authentic photo booth. Fit jawn unicorn grailed , 90’s hella sold kitsch retro fam trust fund.
code: example_meat <- baconipsum(n_sentences = 5L,                            type = "all-meat",                            start_with_lorem = TRUE)  example_hipster <- hipsteripsum(n_sentences = 5L,                                 type = "hipster-centric",                                 start_with_lorem = TRUE)

title: Obtain Lorem Ipsum Text From Web APIs
text: goal lipsum get easy access several “Lorem Ipsum” web APIs simply generate customisable placeholder text. R world, likely commonly used within RMarkdown/Quarto documents Shiny apps. lorem package also serves similar purpose, lipsum’s interfacing variety APIs may allow flexible placeholder outputs. example, loripsum() function gives lot control kinds features placeholder text (example, lists, links, headers, ). lipsum owes lot awesome-ipsum list, uses categorisations: Practical, placeholder generators useful “professional” settings. either generate text Latin, business-sounding text like newspaper articles. Whimsical, playful generators impersonate celebrities, list names dinosaurs, use profanity, . perhaps appropriate personal projects!

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. n_sentences Integer, optional. number sentences generate. Overrides n_paras. type Character. One "-meat" meat words , "meat--filler" meat mixed random lorem ipsum words. Defaults "-meat". start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, starts first paragraph 'Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet'. Defaults TRUE.

title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — litipsum
text: n Integer, optional. number paragraphs generate. default, NULL, generates one "page" text source. tag Character, optional. One "p" "li", renders paragraphs p li tags, respectively. source Character, optional. book take placeholder text. One adventures-sherlock-holmes, dr-jekyll--mr-hyde, dracula, evelina, life--samuel-johnson, picture--dorian-gray, pride--prejudice. default, NULL, chooses one random.

what: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
text: Generates paragraphs quotes Rick Morty. Note output may contain obscenities.

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
code: loremricksum(n_paras = 2L, n_sentences = 4L)

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
text: http://loremricksum.com/

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 2. n_sentences Integer. number sentences generate per paragraph. Defaults 4.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Loripsum Web API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
code: loripsum(   n = 5L,   length = "short",   decorate = FALSE,   link = FALSE,   ul = FALSE,   ol = FALSE,   dl = FALSE,   bq = FALSE,   code = FALSE,   headers = FALSE,   allcaps = FALSE,   prude = FALSE,   plaintext = FALSE )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: https://loripsum.net/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. length Character. average length paragraph. Can "short", "medium", "long" "verylong". Defaults "short". decorate Logical. TRUE, bold, italic marked text. Defaults FALSE. link Logical. TRUE, adds links. Defaults FALSE. ul Logical. TRUE, adds unordered lists. Defaults FALSE. ol Logical. TRUE, adds numbered/ordered lists. Defaults FALSE. dl Logical. TRUE, adds description lists. Defaults FALSE. bq Logical. TRUE, adds blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. code Logical. TRUE, adds code samples. Defaults FALSE. headers Logical. TRUE, adds headers. Defaults FALSE. allcaps Logical. TRUE, uses CAPS. Defaults FALSE. prude Logical. TRUE, removes Latin words construed offensive English, like 'sex' 'homo'. Defaults FALSE. plaintext Logical. TRUE, returns plain text without HTML tags. Defaults FALSE.

what: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: Generates customisable placeholder text using Lorem Markdownum API, formatted markdown.

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
code: markdownum(   n = 5L,   no_headers = FALSE,   no_code = FALSE,   no_inline_markup = FALSE,   no_quotes = FALSE,   no_lists = FALSE,   no_external_links = FALSE,   no_wrapping = FALSE,   underline_headers = FALSE,   reference_links = FALSE,   underscore_em = FALSE,   underscore_strong = FALSE,   fenced_code_blocks = FALSE )

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: https://jaspervdj./lorem-markdownum/

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: n Integer. number "blocks" generate. Defaults 5. no_headers Logical. TRUE, removes headers. Defaults FALSE. no_code Logical. TRUE, removes code snippets. Defaults FALSE. no_inline_markup Logical. TRUE, removes inline markup. Defaults FALSE. no_quotes Logical. TRUE, removes blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. no_lists Logical. TRUE, removes lists. Defaults FALSE. no_external_links Logical. TRUE, replaces external links internal links. Defaults FALSE. no_wrapping Logical. TRUE, prevents text wrapping. Defaults FALSE. underline_headers Logical. TRUE, headers underlined. Defaults FALSE. reference_links Logical. TRUE, uses reference-style links. Defaults FALSE. underscore_em Logical. TRUE, styles  using underscores. Defaults FALSE. underscore_strong Logical. TRUE, styles  using double underscores. Defaults FALSE. fenced_code_blocks Logical. TRUE, fences code blocks back-ticks. Defaults FALSE.

what: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — metaphorpsum
title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — metaphorpsum
text: Generates place holder text nonsensical metaphors.

title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — metaphorpsum
code: metaphorpsum(n_paras = 2L, n_sentences = 4L, p = FALSE)

title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — metaphorpsum
text: http://metaphorpsum.com/

title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — metaphorpsum
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 2. n_sentences Integer. number sentences generate per paragraph. Defaults 4. p Logical. TRUE, wraps paragraphs paragraph tags. Defaults FALSE.

title: lipsum (development version)
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
